name: t3-lattice-registry
description: T3-Lattice v3.4 Market Microstructure Analyzer with VPIN, Quantum Operations, and MCP Integration

scripts.check: bun run cli/t3.ts --help > /dev/null && echo '✅ CLI syntax OK' && bun run web/dashboard-server.ts --help 2>/dev/null && echo '✅ Server syntax OK'
scripts.mcp:test: bun -e "import('./src/mcp/t3lattice-mcp-config.ts').then(async (m) => { const server = new m.T3LatticeMCPServer(); console.log(await server.executeTool('vpin_calculator', {ticks: [{price:100, volume:1000, timestamp:Date.now(), source:'test'}]})); })"
scripts.workers:benchmark: bun -e "import('./src/bun-worker-offloading.ts').then(async (m) => { const tasks = new m.T3LatticeWorkerTasks(m.workerPoolManager); console.log(await tasks.benchmarkWorkers(50)); })"
scripts.start:full: bun run src/mcp/t3lattice-mcp-config.ts & bun run web/advanced-dashboard.ts & bun run persona/persona-runner.ts
scripts.dev:full: concurrently "bun run mcp:dev" "bun run dashboard:enterprise" "bun run persona"
scripts.fresh: bun run clean && bun install && bun run build

author: T3-Lattice Team
